name: promtie
description: Neatly dress up your native promises with simple but powerful utils.

scripts.test: npm run lint && ava test/spec --tap | tap-nyan
scripts.test-cov: nyc ava test/spec --reporter=lcov && echo coverage report: coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts._publish: npm run build && npm t && npm run publish && npm run postbuild

author: IndigoUnited <hello@indigounited.com> (http://indigounited.com)
